front.title: Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) Extensions for Native IP Networks

abstract.t: This document defines the Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) extension for Central Control Dynamic Routing (CCDR) based applications in Native IP networks. It describes the key information that is transferred between Path Computation Element (PCE) and Path Computation Clients (PCC) to accomplish the End-to-End (E2E) traffic assurance in the Native IP network under PCE as a central controller (PCECC).
